entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-08-27
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • `Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.Razor.ProjectSystem.DefaultProjectSnapshot` Retained in Memory after Closing Solution and ForceGC #35865
    17.0-Preview4
  • TextMate and Razor SemanticTokens don't use the same classification #35860
  • RequestDelegateFactory should throw BadHttpRequestException when in development to make diagnosing handler issues easier #35858
    6.0-rc2
  • DeveloperExceptionPageMiddleware should set response status code from BadHttpRequestException #35857
    6.0-rc2
  • RequestDelegateFactory should return "415 Unsupported Media Type" response when parameter binding and the request isn't JSON #35856
    6.0-rc2
  • Contribute "Ask again soon" support to SemanticToken LSP specification #35854
    Razor.Tooling
  • ProjectSnapshotManagerDispatcher has the same thread used for Language Server & VS Client #35852
    17.0-Preview4
  • Add support for stating accepts/consumes metadata is required or not #35849
    6.0-rc2
  • Make Blazor component attribute completion prioritize component attributes #35848
    Razor.Tooling
  • Bring Razor Theme definitions out of WebTools, into aspnetcore-tooling #35847
  • New templates have unnecessary using statement for OpenApi #35840
  • Add nullable struct support to BindAsync #35839
    6.0-rc2
  • EmailFactorFailsAfterSecurityStampChangeTest #35836
    Backlog
  • blazor multiple authentication cookie schemes not working #35832
  • Validation data/information for Model not added to Tag when using EditorFor() and EditorTemplates #35831
  • The error message for when calling UseStartup isn't correct #35830
    6.0-rc2
  • Add return types to DI extension methods in SpaStaticFilesExtensions #35828
  • Blazor WebAssembly authentication relaying on archived oidc-clinet.js #35825
  • VM6:1 Uncaught pause_on_uncaught exception in visual studio 2022 version 6.0.0 Preview 7 #35821
  • Single file build time regression: plaintext #35820
  • Startup improvement: mvc #35819
  • Startup regression: fortunes_dapper, fortunes_ef #35818
  • Fixer/Analyzer: Suggest rewriting builder.Host.ConfigureServices to builder.Services #35817
  • Fixer/Analyzer: Suggest rewriting builder.Host.ConfigureLogging to builder.Logging #35816
  • Fixer/Analyzer: Suggest switching builder.Host.ConfigureAppConfiguration and builder.Host.ConfigureHostConfiguration to use the builder.Configuration property directly #35815
  • Analyzer: Warn that UseStartup/Configure and ConfigureWebHost isn't supported on WebApplicationBuilder #35814
  • Fixer/Analyzer: Hoist explicit calls to HttpContext.RequestServices.GetService to route handler parameters #35812

Closed

  • Blazor Wasm: debugging broken when referencing @attribute with enum contructor argument #25380
    Backlog
  • Upgrading default Blazor template from 5.0 to 6.0 preview 7 causes fallback endpoint _Host not being found. #35403
  • WebSocket Connection failed: Error during WebSocket Handshake #35850
  • `IDataProtectionKeyContext.DataProtectionKeys` property should have `set` accessor #35599
  • Blazorwasm hot-reload breaks if page is manually reloaded after initial changes #32208
    6.0-rc2
  • Test failure: `StatusCode204StopsLongPollingTriggersOnClosed` #35684
  • HTML rename with '!' deletes other tag #33126
    17.0-Preview4
  • [Blazor Webassembly] Client runs fine on development machine, fails to launch on linux server #35829
  • Razor page runtime compilation not working any more #33425
  • Dashes in a hosted Blazor WebAssembly project name break OIDC security #35337
  • ASP.NET core web api template (.NET 6 Preview 7), when enabled support for docker and has some content in wwwroot folder, throws an exception 'The path must be absolute.' when started from debugger #35834
  • SignalR client callback not firing in Blazor WebAssembly client IF client application was published AND callback parameter type has an Immutable collection property #35598
  • Exception OnParametersSetAsync with CascadingParameter #35696
  • Microsoft.AspNetCore.Authentication.JwtBearer middleware stopped working with the latest build #35809
  • [Feature] Custom route tokens #35661
  • Support Hot Reload for ASP.NET Core for F# #35824
  • JwtBearerHandler logs JWT exceptions as "Error" even if it recovers. Suggesting "Debug" #35766
    Discussions
  • Minimal WebApi host Blazor WASM #35822
  • Startup regression: fortunes_dapper, fortunes_ef #35695
  • Perf regression: fortunes #35789
  • Add ParameterInfo argument to BindAsync and return specific type instead of object #35748
    6.0-rc1

PullRequests

Created

  • Re-enable CA1305 #35867
  • Pass request cancellation token when using IAsyncEnumerable in MVC and WriteAsJsonAsync #35866
  • Log time-taken more precisely #35863
    area-runtime
  • [release/6.0] HTTP/3: Server cancellation and abort exceptions consistency #35861
    area-runtime
  • Added support for Int64 and DateTime #35855
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • onBoard package validation #35846
  • [Templates] Add tests to ensure we don't break the SPA templates #35844
  • Remove unusued using statement (fixes #35840) #35841
    area-mvc
  • [WIP] Use minimal APIs for F# project templates #35833
    area-mvc
  • [release/6.0] HTTP/3: Support canceling requests that aren't reading a body #35823
    area-runtime
  • Stop Serializing Return Values for `InvokeVoidAsync` #35807
    area-blazor

Merged

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0-rc1' => 'release/6.0' #35813
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, Type: Merge Forward :fast_forward:, community-contribution, 6.0-rc2
  • HTTP/3: Server cancellation and abort exceptions consistency #35764
    area-runtime, 7.0-preview1
  • [release/6.0] Tweak readme for Identity server #35862
    area-mvc, 6.0-rc2
  • [release/6.0] Fix forgot password/edit profile in B2C template #35843
    area-mvc, 6.0-rc2
  • Tweak readme for Identity server #35416
    area-mvc, 7.0-preview1
  • Fix forgot password/edit profile in B2C template #35811
    area-mvc, community-contribution, 7.0-preview1
  • [release/6.0] Identity UI Bootstrap 5.1 tweaks #35842
    area-identity, 6.0-rc2
  • [release/6.0-rc1] Add API parameter description to API description to represent the request body - 35421 #35798
    feature-minimal-actions, area-web-frameworks, 6.0-rc1
  • Update timeouts in Java tests #35687
    area-signalr, signalr-client-java, 7.0-preview1
  • Identity UI Bootstrap 5.1 tweaks #35467
    area-identity, 7.0-preview1
  • [SPA] Add tests to ensure we don't break the SPA templates when making template changes #35783
    area-mvc, 7.0-preview1
  • Quarantine SignalR test #35730
    area-signalr, 7.0-preview1
  • [release/6.0] Fix keyboard input for 'time' and 'datetime-local' inputs #35742
    area-blazor, 6.0-rc2
  • [Blazor] Applies API review feedback and removes byte array APIs from the public API surface #35768
    area-blazor, 6.0.0
  • [release/6.0-rc1] Add ParameterInfo argument to BindAsync and return specific type instead of object #35795
    Servicing-approved, area-web-frameworks, 6.0-rc1
  • Add ParameterInfo argument to BindAsync #35791
    area-web-frameworks, 7.0-preview1
  • HTTP/3: Skip client certificate tests on non-Windows #35803
    area-runtime, 7.0-preview1

Updated

  • Big-endian fixes: Kestrel string processing #35711
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Use ArrayPool as default pool fallback #35719
    area-runtime
  • Big-endian fixes: Kestrel IP/socket address handling #35713
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Add analyzer for detecting misplaced attributes on delegates #35779
    area-web-frameworks
  • [release/6.0] HTTP/3: Skip client certificate tests on non-Windows #35804
    area-runtime
  • Quarantine `CanBindTextboxNullableDateOnlyWithFormat` #34985
    area-blazor
  • Add an analyzer that warns about non-literal sequence numbers #35805
    area-infrastructure
  • Linux: Fix nested group resolution for RBAC claims #35279
    area-security, community-contribution
